name: @platelet-app/graphql
description: GraphQL operations for the platelet.app project
author: Theo Cranmore <theo@platelet.app>

scripts.sedQueries: sed -i 's:import \* as APITypes from "../API";:import \* as APITypes from "../API.js";:g' ../../src/graphql/queries.ts ../../src/graphql/mutations.ts ../../src/graphql/subscriptions.ts
scripts.build: cd ../.. && amplify api gql-compile && amplify codegen && npm run sedQueries --workspace @platelet-app/graphql && cd packages/graphql && tsc --project tsconfig.json
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm version patch
